attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Martin has been a worthy Speaker who represents the large majority of MPs and has been their Speaker of choice; which why he has lasted so long. He is clearly ready now to run the country and will do so in the manner to which we have become accustomed. He will maintain the parliamentary traditions of the twenty-first century.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
